And now over to @TripAdvisor to leave my scathing (and well-earned) review... @vvtci #turksandcaicos
Ive eaten at some top restaurants. Your food was overpriced & mediocre AF. Gaslighting in more ways than one? Never coming back, @vvtci.
I can forgive a mistake with a sincere apology. But gaslighting me? Oh no NOO, bruh. You just opened my pandora' box of rage tweets, @vvtci.
Terrible experience at @vvtci. Bad enough my order was wrong, but then guy tries to tell me I am eating something I am not. Seriously?
